name: The Perfect General
summary:
The ultimate military strategy game! Can you become the Perfect General?

The Blue Army: Your sole existence is to eradicate the Red Army into a pulp of burnt ash. You can't wait to get out into the battlefield and witness the destruction of your sole enemy.

The Red Army: "Ramming Speed" is the only word you remember when the battle begins. Take your army out and decimate the blue trash until you hear the pleasing sound of destruction.
